A

activeNodes - Variable in class com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.NetworkManager
The list of all nodes known to be active on the network.
addDiscoveredNode(RemoteNode) - Method in class com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.NetworkManager
Directly adds a new node to the active node list.
addDiscoveredNode(RemoteNode) - Static method in class com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.ProcessorNode
Refreshes the status of the given node and adds it to the active node list if it is not already there.
addedNodes - Variable in class com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.NetworkManager
Node that have been discovered and who's discovery needs to be relayed to other nodes.
announceFoundNode(RemoteNode) - Static method in class com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.ProcessorNode
Alerts the jobs currently running on this node to a new node on the network.
announceNodeFailure(RemoteNode) - Static method in class com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.ProcessorNode
Alerts the jobs currently running on this node to a failure of a node on the network.
